title: Problems with the Typophile website?
content:
Anyone else having trouble with the Typophile website?

On the home page the 'headline' is now just a bullet and both the Newest and Handpicked lists are empty. The Hottest list is there but seems a little buggy. Everything else appears to be OK. Strange.

I'm using a PC and get the same thing in IE and Firefox :(
author: wormwood

comments.content: It happens on and off. It is a known problem.
Oh. OK. Thanks Miss Tiffany. I'll be patitent then :)

patitent = patient + penitent

I inadvertently made up a good one last night: troublematic (troubling + problematic)

I think Troublematic™ is a synonym for planned obsolescence.

;)

So problematic that I do not know whether I am logged in or out!  
Exploiting the bandwidth, here are few (clever) words:  
Guess + Estimate = Guesstimate  
Important + Impotent= Importent  
Fun-filled + Fantastic = Funtastic  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Regards with Flowers to All

What is wrong with Typophile? Puzzling me:  
Why when I click on some posts with new replies, I see no update?  
Why am I recognized in GDF, but not on Design forum? Thus,  
Why can I post in GDF, but not in DF?  
Help please.
